attributes.action: adding more bins , disposable bags , emptying bins regularly
attributes.additional_details: We would like more bins around the area and so it makes people wanna pick up the dog waste more because they won’t have to carry around the waste for ages, disposable bags because otherwise we have to issue of plastic and more landfill building up and also emptying bins more often or regularly as people don’t pick it up because they don’t have a bin to put in so more bins and emptied often.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
